title: Lead Developer & Technical Co-Founder
content: Led development of a full-stack app at Noveltor, using various frameworks and languages.
Achieved 99% uptime through Serverless-oriented architecture and performance optimization.
Tested application thoroughly to ensure optimal functionality and user experience.
Collaborated closely with designers and stakeholders to ensure seamless development and delivery.

title: Web Developer Intern
content: Leveraged skills in WordPress, Python, and Django to create and implement custom features and functionality.
Collaborated with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to ensure timely and high-quality delivery of the website.

title: Full Stack Software Engineer
content: Collaborated with team members and stakeholders to develop and deploy scalable software solutions.
Designed and maintained user-friendly front-end interfaces using React.js.
Developed and integrated back-end components using Node.js and PostgreSQL for optimal performance.
Stayed current with industry trends and technologies, incorporating emerging best practices and tools.
